citations.narrative:
Item Personnel Qualifications 2.32 b
The investigator for protocols AC-AAA12700, AC AAAF9203 and AC-AAA9801 has had 2 suspensions due to
failure to follow his protocol and in addition the use of outdated drugs and leaving an animal unattended.
The investigator underwent training after the first suspension and then committed another violation requiring the
second suspension by the IACUC.
Before continuing the investigator needs to demonstrate he is qualified both technically and understanding the
requirements set forth by the IACUC and the IACUC needs to verify these qualifications
Correct from this day 8/19/14
Exit interview took place at the end of inspection
Inspection took place over 2 days 8/18-19/14
